Text: nice to see the season pick up again. & wonderful for you guys to fill in the missing episodes. i noticed we still do not have 210 from you yet {C_P}, are you planning on bringing us that one as well ?
Yes when they air again, We will try to get 210 and 208 that we have missed.
Thanks guys. As usual, the audio and video are excellent. Played on a 42' plasma TV, no complaints!
